mapper.update: update meal_type set type_name = #{typeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type_code = #{typeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type_icon = #{typeIcon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where type_id = #{typeId}
mapper.select: select type_id, type_name, type_code, type_icon, create_time, update_time from meal_type
